question_text: Did Alberta Ballet take any actions this reporting period that expanded its national or international presence?
If yes, what actions did we take (campaigns, partnerships, press, collaborations)?
What measurable outcomes did these actions generate (audience growth, media coverage, invitations, web or social spikes)?
If not, what prevented progress on expanding our presence this period?
Did we develop or advance any partnerships that enhance Alberta Balletâ€™s global brand this period?
If yes, who were the partners, what was the purpose of each partnership, and what stage are we at?
What outcomes or next steps are expected from these partnerships?
If not, were there potential partnership opportunities that we postponed or declined? Explain.
Did we form any collaborations or partnerships with luxury brands during this period?
If so, who were they and what for?
Did we secure any luxury brand sponsorships during this period?
If so, who were they and what for?
How much revenue does this represent?
What are the benefits to the sponsor?
Did Alberta Ballet participate in any touring, showcases, or external appearances that support global presence this period?
If yes, where did we appear, what did we present, and who were the key audiences?
How did we leverage these appearances for recruitment, donor development, or brand visibility?
If not, were there opportunities we considered but did not pursue? Why?
What is our YOY subscription renewals numbers and percentage change in this period?
What is our YOY subscription NTF numbers and percentage change in this period?
What is our YOY single tickets renewals numbers and percentage change in this period?
What is our YOY singel tickets NTF numbers and percentage change in this period?
Did we deliver any experiential marketing events during this period?
If so, what did we do and how many people attended each event?
If not, why not?
Did we deliver any pop-up performances during this period?
If so, what did we do and how many people attended each event?
If not, why not?
What is our YOY website traffic numbers and percentage for AlbertaBallet.com?
What is our YOY website traffic numbers and percentage for TicketMaster.com?

What is our YOY Facebook traffic numbers and percentage for the Company?

What is our YOY TikTok traffic numbers and percentage for the Company?

What is our YOY TikTok traffic numbers and percentage for the School?
How many unique Hubspot forms are in use on AlbertaBalletSchool.com?
What is our AlbertaBalletSchool.com YOY leads captured numbers and percentage?
What is our YOY website traffic numbers and percentage for AlbertaBalletCommunity.com?
What is our YOY Instagram traffic numbers and percentage for Community?
What is our YOY Facebook traffic numbers and percentage for Community?
What is our YOY YouTube traffic numbers and percentage for Community?

Are all leadership training sessions completed as per requirements from Canadian Heritage?
What were the outcomes taught?
How many people completed the training?
If they weren't all complete, which sessions remain?
Did you observe notable changes in staff morale or engagement this reporting period?
If yes, what did you observe and how is it affecting teams?
If not, are there any early warning signs or strengths worth noting?
Did all personnel requiring coaching undergo coaching as per requirements from either Canadian Heritage or the Board of Directors?
If not, why not?
Were any formal team building events or workshops completed during this period?
If yes, describe (how many people, which departments, topics covered)
Were any leadership retreats implemented during this period?
If yes, describe (how many people, which departments, topics covered)
Were any Social Committee events held during this period?
If yes, which departments participated and what were the events?
Did your area take any actions this period to strengthen team cohesion or workplace culture?
If yes, what actions did you take and what impact did you see?
If not, what culture-building efforts do you feel are still needed?
Did we advance any diversity, equity, or inclusion training this reporting period?
If yes, what actions were taken and what outcomes or feedback have you observed?
If not, what barriers are limiting progress on DEI work?
Was the Respect in the Workplace Policy updated this period?
If yes, were there substantive changes required from the last policy?
If not, why not?
Were all Employee Handbooks completed for this period?
If not, why not?
Were the School Teaching Guidelines updated for this period?
If not, why not?
Were employee engagement surveys completed for this period?
If yes, what were the key findings and recommendations?
If not, why not?
Were student satisfaction surveys completed for this period?
If yes, what were the key findings and recommendations?
If not, why not?
Were parent satisfaction surveys completed for this period?
If yes, what were the key findings and recommendations?
If not, why not?
Did all employees complete Respect in the Workplace training this period?
If not, why not?
Was there employee turnover during this last period (from last period)?
What was the employee turnover rate this period (from last period)?
Number of resignations? Which departments?
Number of terminations? Which departments?
Were any of these employees key personnel?
If yes, in which department and which position?
Were there employee grievances or complaints (formal, reported) during this period?
How many and which department?
Were there employee incident reports during this period?
How many and what was the incident (don't share confidential information)?
Was a structured board recruitment process developed and/or implemented for this period?
If not, why not?
Is the board recruitment process aligned to the strategic plan and needs of Alberta Ballet?
Was a board onboarding process developed and/or implemented in this period?
If not, why not?

If not, why not?
